content.rendered:
Friday, October 25, 2024 

Today is a “B” Day 

Club Meetings and Information 

  • Photographers will be in the Auditorium for Staff Photos and student make-up photos today from 10:00 -2:00. 
     
  • 6th graders!! Tonight is the Halloween dance in the back gymnasium. You will be dropped off and picked up by the back gym parking lot. Join us for food, dancing, and fun! It will be a spooktacular time! Tickets will be sold online only through ParentSquare. You are encouraged to wear a costume but it is not required, however, keep in mind there can be nothing covering your face and no toy weapons will be allowed. We hope to see you tonight!!!! 
     
  • 6th, 7th, & 8th Graders! Get your order forms in for our annual Poinsettia and Wreath Sale! Order forms and money are due no later than Monday, October 28 to the WDC station located outside Student Services. It may seem early to order these holiday plants but get them before they are gone! All proceeds for this fundraiser provide aid for our students in need here at Maple Avenue. 
     
  • A Hand Up Club is looking for members who will inspire others to make the world a better place. We are open to all grade levels. Come learn about lending a hand at our next meeting in room 278 (Red Springs) after school on Monday October 28th. 
     
  • Introduction to Bagpiping Club will meet on Monday after school in P222. Don’t forget your chanter and music.

  • The No Place for Hate meeting is rescheduled and is now Monday after school in room 257. There will not be a meeting on Wednesday. 
     
  • Best Buddies is BACK at Maple Ave! Our first meeting will be on October 30th 2:30-3:00 in the Large Group Room. Come and find out more about this awesome club! Contact Miss Douglas with any questions!

Check out the Maple Avenue Club Calendar for club meetings and room information!

As always, BE SAFE, BE RESPECTFUL, BE RESPONSIBLE, BE KIND!  

Make it a great day, or not…the choice is yours.
